name: Bob
text: What's the deal with these cards?

name: Voice
text: Basically you have to pick one of them to get a reward I guess.

name: Bob
text: I'm pretty sure that's not how shops work...

name: Voice
text: Yeah, yeah, just bear with it for a while.

name: Voice
text: Basically you'll get stuffs that will increase your damage or defense, regenerate your health, or get some items to use in battle.

name: Voice
text: Now now, we don't know which one to pick, don't we?

name: Voice
text: NO YOU DON'T KNOW THE FIRST THING ABOUT THIS TOURNAMENT

name: Bob
text: ...Okay, but be sure to get what I want.

name: Bob
text: Or I'll listen to you less every time you don't pick what I want.
